page.title: 09Milborne Port Primary School
page.content: Milborne Port County Primary School is situated in the heart of the village. There are over 200 children in seven classes and 8 teaching staff.The children's ages range from 4 years to 11 years at which time they leave to attend a variety of secondary schools. The school is made up of old and new buildings comprising of 7 classrooms (3 of which are mobile classrooms) a hall,a school kitchen,a practical area,a library and various offices. For recreation there is swimming pool, an adventure playground,playing fields football and cricket pitches. Subjects taught are English,Mathematics,Religious Education,History,Geography,Environmen tal studies,Games,Art and Craft.
